page.title: 05TOURISM IN BATH
page.content: Bath is a very famous tourist resort. From April 1984 to March 1985,some 926,811 people visited the Roman Baths. The tourist centres in Bath had over 40,000 visitors in July.They have up to 2000 people a day visiting them,and as there are only 4 members of staff at the counters, that means they each deal with about 500 people on certain days! Americans are attracted to Bath, and their favourite venue is the Roman Baths.Whitsun is the busiest day. At Bath's tourist information centre they employ 12 members of staff. Many tourists visit Bath more than once.After London it is probably the most visited place in Britain.The city is known throughout the world, and people from all countries may be found in Bath in the summer months.
